title: cmd/dist: -vv flag interfere with output of env command
body:
# go tool dist env -vv >a
# cat a
GOROOT="/root/hg/go"
GOBIN="/root/hg/go/bin"
GOARCH="386"
GOOS="linux"
GOHOSTARCH="386"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOTOOLDIR="/root/hg/go/pkg/tool/linux_386"
GOCHAR="8"
rm -rf /var/tmp/go-cbuild-LstMR4
#

We do not want

rm -rf /var/tmp/go-cbuild-LstMR4

line in file a.
